set.name: rommake.flags
set.value: -es60ibymacros -DXTI_TRACES -DNO_PLATSEC

set.name: version.copyright
set.value: (C) Nokia

set.name: image.type.version
set.value: $(if $(subst rnd,,$(TYPE)),,RD)$(if $(subst subcon,,$(TYPE)),,SC)

set.name: model.template
set.value: ${version.copyright} ${version.product.name}

set.name: uda.template
set.value: ${pr}.${version.bandvariant}.${build.number}${fota.version}\\n${today}\\n${product.type}\\n${copyright} ${version.product.name} (${uda.id})

set.name: image.type.version
set.value: EE$(if $(subst rnd,,$(TYPE)),,RD)
